The '''Egypt national under-17 football team''' ({{lang-ar| Ù ÙØªØ®Ø¨ Ù ØµØ± Ø§ÙÙØ·ÙÙ ØªØ­Øª 17 Ø³ÙØ©}}), nicknamed '''The Pharaohs''' ({{lang-ar|Ø§ÙÙØ±Ø§Ø¹ÙØ©}}), is the national team of [[Egypt]] Under-17 and is administered by the [[Egyptian Football Association]].
== African Under-17 Championship Record ==
* [[1995 African Under-17 Championship]] - Didn't Participate * [[1997 African Under-17 Championship]] - '''Winners''' * 1999 [[African Under-17 Championship]] - Didn't Participate * 2001 [[African Under-17 Championship]] - Didn't Participate * [[2003 African Under-17 Championship]] - ''4th'' * [[2005 African Under-17 Championship]] - Didn't Participate * [[2007 African Under-17 Championship]] - Didn't Participate * [[2009 African Under-17 Championship]] - Didn't Participate * [[2011 African Under-17 Championship]] - ''Group Stage''
